challenges.title: JavaScript Quirks
challenges.description: What will the following code output?
challenges.hint: Remember type coercion in JavaScript: + can concatenate strings or add numbers.

challenges.title: Python Indentation
challenges.description: What's wrong with this Python code?
challenges.code:
def calculate_sum(a, b):
    result = a + b
        return result

print(calculate_sum(5, 3))

options.text: Incorrect indentation on the return statement
The function name should be camelCase
The print statement should be inside the function

challenges.hint: Python is very particular about consistent indentation levels.

challenges.title: Java Declarations
challenges.description: Which of the following Java variable declarations is NOT valid?
challenges.code: // Which one will cause a compiler error?
challenges.hint: Java variable names can include letters, digits, underscores, and dollar signs, but must not start with a digit.
